title: Animating Stroke Text
body:
Check out this neat example by [Fabio Ottaviani](https://codepen.io/supah) demonstrating how CSS can be used to animate stroke text...

See the Pen Animate background of a stroke text by Fabio Ottaviani (@supah) on CodePen.

Be wary of using text-stroke in production (its not in W3C spec) - but a fun demo in any case!
